Question: 1NCE CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
1NCE

Product: CES 2024

- 1NCE will showcase its latest IoT connectivity solutions at CES 2024
- The focus will be on the 1NCE IoT Flat Rate, a connectivity solution for IoT devices
- The 1NCE IoT Flat Rate offers 10-year connectivity for IoT devices with a one-time fee
- It provides global IoT connectivity with a single SIM card
- The solution is designed to simplify IoT connectivity and reduce operational costs for IoT deployments
